overview.en: Ultra Salescloud is next-generation intelligent marketing ecosystem based on blockchain technology. It offers an innovative solution to overcome key pain points in digital marketing by adopting decentralized, intelligent, trusted, traceable blockchain technology.
overview.zh:
链云是基于区块链技术的新一代数字营销应用链，运用区块链去中心化、可信任、可溯源的技术特性，结合数字营销、大数据及人工智能技术，破解中长尾流量市场中流量欺诈、虚假广告及作弊等
行业问题，建立一个健康协调、可持续的数字营销生态系统。
